sentences.english: LCD screen display, man-machine dialogue, graphic display interface.
sentences.chinese: 液晶屏幕顯示，人機對話，圖形顯示界面。

sentences.english: I do my e-mail on a 20-inch liquid crystal display (LCD) monitor.
sentences.chinese: 現在我在20英寸的液晶顯示器上發電子郵件。

sentences.english: R10 serial or parallel LCD decision means of communication.
sentences.chinese: R10決定液晶的串行或者並行通訊方式。

sentences.english: Thermal grating was generated after resonant absorption of light by the dye.
sentences.chinese: 染料對泵浦光共振吸收後，在液晶中形成熱光柵。

sentences.english: A dramatic example would be shooting LCD screens.
sentences.chinese: 一個戲劇性的例子是射擊液晶屏幕。

sentences.english: Liquid crystalline epoxy resin is a kind of liquid crystalline thermosets .
sentences.chinese: 液晶環氧樹脂是一種具有廣闊應用前景的液晶熱固體。

sentences.english: Liquid crystalline epoxy resin is a kind of liquid crystalline thermosets .
sentences.chinese: 液晶環氧樹脂是一種具有廣闊應用前景的液晶熱固體。

sentences.english: This is the only three Chinese enterprises LCD panel.
sentences.chinese: 這是中國僅有的三家液晶面板企業。

sentences.english: Large LCD with Chinese display, automatic controlled by computer, keyboard operation.
sentences.chinese: 全中文大屏幕液晶顯示，電腦自動控制，鍵盤操作。

sentences.english: This process aligns the liquid crystal molecules parallel to the buffing direction.
sentences.chinese: 這個過程調整好與擦亮平行的液晶分子方向。

sentences.english: I can confirm that I like the F60 more than last year's car.
sentences.chinese: 我可以證實，我喜歡比去年的賽車更多的液晶顯示屏。

sentences.english: It is hard to say whether the use of organic LCD panels should be considered a disadvantage.
sentences.chinese: 這是很難說是否有機液晶面板的使用應被視爲劣勢。

sentences.english: The cell theory is used to study nematic liquid crystals formed by biaxial molecules.
sentences.chinese: 通過格胞理論研究雙軸分子構成的向列型液晶。

sentences.english: The change of bag-making length is set through liquid crystal screen, and no need to replace the roll.
sentences.chinese: 改變制袋長度由液晶屏設定，無需更換版輥。

sentences.english: The advances of side-chain polymeric liquid crystals as GLC stationary phases are described.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了側鏈高分子液晶作爲氣相色譜固定液的進展。

sentences.english: The results showed that all polymers prepared were thermotropic liquid cryrt-ailine polymers and formed nematic phase only.
sentences.chinese: 結果顯示，所製備的聚合物爲熱致向列型液晶聚合物。

definition: CRT used in TV or computer monitor/picture tube/kinescope
